    public class Student
extends User

    • Constructor Detail

      • Student

        public Student(long id,
               java.lang.String password,
               java.lang.String firstName,
               java.lang.String lastName,
               java.lang.String emailAddress,
               java.util.Date lastAccess,
               java.util.Date enrolDate,
               boolean enabled,
               char type,
               java.lang.String programCode,
               java.lang.String programDescription,
               int year,
               java.util.Vector<Mark> mark)
        throws InvalidUserDataException
        Parameterized constructor - creates a new student instance
        Parameters:
        id - the student's id number
        password - the student's account password
        firstName - the student's first name
        lastName - the student's last name
        emailAddress - the student's email address
        lastAccess - the last time the student accessed their account
        enrolDate - the date the student was registered in the system
        enabled - the active/inactive status of the student's account
        type - the account type
        programCode - the student's program code
        programDescription - the student's program description
        year - the year the student is registered for
        mark - the grade the student has earned
        Throws:
        InvalidUserDataException - exception is thrown if any values passed into constructor are deemed invalid

      • authenticate

        public static Student authenticate(long id,
                                   java.lang.String password)
                            throws NotFoundException
        Verifies that password and login match database records before allowing a student access to their account
        Parameters:
        id - The unique student ID associated with an account
        password - The password provided by the user
        Returns:
        Student Object containing all details in database related to the authenticated student, or otherwise returns null if the credentials do not pass authentication
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - Thrown if attempt is made to update a student record using an id that is not present in the database
